sentence.Network_en: The police have been given extra powers to entrap drug traffickers.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方已经被进一步授权诱捕毒贩。

sentence.Network_en: It was indeed a clever plan to entrap his opponent, but in the end he was hoist by his own petard.
sentence.Network_cn: 设圈套陷害他的对手固然是个妙计, 可是到头来却是作法自毙.

sentence.Network_en: She was quite prepared to entrap the bishop himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 她做好充分准备去勾引主教本人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... enlace 用带缚 entrap 诱陷 enclose 围入，关进.
以p结尾的英语英文单词 ... encamp 扎营,露营 entrap 骗入,诱捕,使陷入 envelop 包封,遮盖,包围.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... enshrine 藏于神龛中 entrap 用陷阱诱捕 enwreathe 饰以花环.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(三)|联想记忆法背单词 ... entity n. 实体 entrap v. 诱陷，以网或陷阱捕捉 enumerate v. 计数；枚举.

...是从他们的行为举止中寻找并读懂线索，或者采用所谓的陷阱抗辩（entrapment defense），也就是，说谎者证实了你仅仅假设是真 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Old French entraper, from en- 'in' + trappe 'a trap'

entry.def: If you entrap someone, you trick or deceive them and make them believe or do something wrong.

example.ex: The police have been given extra powers to entrap drug traffickers...
example.tran: 警方已经被进一步授权诱捕毒贩。

example.ex: He overturned the conviction, saying the defendant was entrapped...
example.tran: 他声称被告是被诱骗的，从而推翻了有罪的判决。

means.word_mean: 1. take or catch as if in a snare or trap;

sentences.sentence: "The innocent man was framed by the police"

means.word_mean: 2. catch in or as if in a trap;

auth_sentence.content: Time has come for this flawed human to entrap him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Time has come for this flawed human to entrap him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Time has come for this flawed human to entrap him.

auth_sentence.content: The filter...would selectively entrap any magnetic particles.
auth_sentence.res_content: The filter...would selectively entrap any magnetic particles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The filter...would selectively entrap any magnetic particles.

auth_sentence.content: "These eddies tend to have some integrity, they entrap material in them and carry it out into the deep ocean," he says.
auth_sentence.res_content: "These eddies tend to have some integrity, they entrap material in them and carry it out into the deep ocean," he says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "These eddies tend to have some integrity, they entrap material in them and carry it out into the deep ocean," he says.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+dem人民+ic表形容词→在人民之中→地方性的
en进入……之中,包围,成为+cage笼子→v.关入笼中
en进入……之中,包围,成为+chain锁链→v.束缚
en进入……之中,包围,成为+roll转,倦→往里倦→注册

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+title标题,头衔→v. 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
en进入……之中,包围,成为+trap陷阱→v.以网或陷阱捕捉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+purple紫→v.使成紫色 v.发紫
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+act行动→进入行动→颁布[法令]
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+chant反复说;咒语→被咒语所迷醉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+courage勇气→使人进入勇气→鼓励
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+danger危险→v.使危险
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+franchise特权,公民权→给予选举权

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使忙碌, 雇佣, 预定
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+gage挑战→进入挑战→忙碌于……
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+large大→v.扩大, 放大
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+light光+en变成→给人光明→启发
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+list名单→进入名单→入伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+rich富的→v.使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+wrap包裹→v.包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注

sentences.en: It was indeed a clever plan to entrap his opponent, but in the end he was hoist by his own petard.
sentences.cn: 设圈套陷害他的对手固然是个妙计，可是到头来却是作法自毙。

sentences.en: He was entrapped into undertaking the work.
